inclusion.criterion: Biopsy within 12 months of date of registration

inclusion.criterion: Prostate volume: ≤ 100 cc (recommended not required) Determined using: volume = π/6 x length x height x width Measurement from CT or ultrasound ≤90 days prior to registration.

inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has a history of alcohol consumption and smoking, but no other exclusion criteria are mentioned.
